TopicTitle: Kerbal X Mk II - Jet assisted

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

I tried to get a little bit more Oomph out of the Kerbal X so did a couple of adjustments... Then I couldnt stop to do some more.

Did anyone of you tried to tune up one of the stock Rockets?

What do you think about Jet assisted Take offs?

Javascript is disabled. View full album
This should be Kerbal X Mk III , because the Mk I was before 0.18, and the Mk II was created on the Kerbon, if I remember correctly.
